paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted genetic variant information for KCNH2, including penetrance data.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: Whole exome sequencing identified two variants in the KCNH2 gene.

functional_data.summary: Predicted to be highly damaging by SIFT and Polyphen2.

variants.segregation_data: The variant was also observed in the mother.
variants.additional_notes: The variant shows a high level of sequence conservation.
key_quotes: Both variants show a high level of sequence conservation and are predicted to be highly damaging by SIFT and Polyphen2.
